{{cpp/title|indirectly_copyable}}
{{cpp/iterator/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=iterator|since=c++20|1=
template&lt;class In, class Out&gt;
concept indirectly_copyable =
    std::indirectly_readable&lt;In&gt; &amp;&amp;
    std::indirectly_writable&lt;Out, iter_reference_t&lt;In&gt;&gt;;
}}

{{tt|indirectly_copyable}} 概念指定 {{lconcept|indirectly_readable}} 类型与 {{lconcept|indirectly_writable}} 类型间的关系。{{tt|indirectly_writable}} 类型必须能直接复制 {{tt|indirectly_readable}} 类型所引用的对象。
